2/2 @EnvAgencySW @dartmoornpa @ExmoorNP @AliDriverUK  Grown well over the summer, are collecting lots of silt and forcing the ditch sideways. Should form wet woodland with time, a low impact way to re-wood upland streams. Grey willow coppiced from a nearby SSSI on rotation üòÉüåøüí¶ https://t.co/oOMSXlUQLT
1/2 @EnvAgencySW @dartmoornpa @ExmoorNP @AliDriverUK  Here are live willow bundles that went into this Exmoor stream (really a ditch at this point) in March '19. https://t.co/8oW8Q8Daia

It‚Äôs not just #sewage that is killing #rivers it‚Äôs poor land management too. This is the Glottenham Stream in the #HighWeald #AONB with a heavy burden of #soil run-off after a moderate amount of rain. @EnvAgencySE @SE_Rivers_Trust @SussexWildlife @highweald https://t.co/TmSH18z4r8

Work is progressing on the Steeping River and Wainfleet relief channel.

Dredging has been done at Thorpe Culvert and past Bycroft‚Äôs Bridge.

Read more: https://t.co/0xOqxHqZgB

tweets.text:
9pm, Thursday:

No flood alerts CURRENTLY in our region, but Friday will be wet and windy as #StormAlex swings by...

Why not sign-up for flood alerts straight to your device? Plenty of great advice ‚¨áÔ∏è 

Free and easy... 

‚Ä¶https://t.co/64gyL62UXF #floodaware #MartinLewis https://t.co/dNRUwwrvF3

Over the next few weeks, the installation of sample flood panels begins in Little Aynam in Kendal as part of phase one of the ¬£76 million Flood Risk Management Scheme. Read more about the works online @thefloodhub - https://t.co/FUci31Smv0 #kendal #floodscheme https://t.co/16JWpyRVkS

tweets.text: We are sorry that some of you applying for the Green Recovery Challenge Fund today have had difficulties with our website due to high volumes of traffic. We are working to resolve this and will update you tomorrow.
@KathCockshaw @SE_Rivers_Trust @HeritageFundUK @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DCMS We are getting this error message, is this same for everyone? https://t.co/C283faCKW4

‚ÄúThe UK is importing foreign sewage sludge for use on farmland despite serious health and environment concerns.‚Äù

The Netherlands effectively ban it from the food chain and what do we do?

Why the @EnvAgency license it‚Äôs use in England. 
 
https://t.co/tm75F7gUnQ
